function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of strategies for encouraging physical activity during health crises like COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased physical activity levels, potential negative impact on mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Develop and implement effective strategies for promoting physical activity during health crises, conduct further research to test the effectiveness of recommended strategies","Technologies":"Health promotion campaigns, online resources for at-home workouts, virtual fitness classes","People":"General healthy population, children with autism spectrum disorders, individuals at risk of decreased physical activity","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, fitness professionals"},{"Description":"Limited evidence on the effectiveness of recommended physical activity strategies for the general public","Impact":"Uncertainty about the suitability and effectiveness of recommended strategies, potential lack of uptake by the general public","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to test the effectiveness of the recommended strategies, develop evidence-based guidelines for promoting physical activity, disseminate information to the public about the benefits of physical activity during health crises","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, evidence-based guideline development platforms, public health communication channels","People":"General healthy population, public health organizations, research institutions","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, health professionals"},{"Description":"Incomplete data analysis and research on the impact of COVID-19 on physical activities and mental health","Impact":"Limited understanding of the relationship between COVID-19, physical activity, and mental health, potential lack of targeted interventions","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive data analysis, further research, and longitudinal studies to understand the impact of COVID-19 on physical activities and mental health, develop targeted interventions based on evidence","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, longitudinal study platforms, mental health assessment tools","People":"General healthy population, individuals at risk of mental health challenges, public health organizations","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, mental health professionals"}]}
